properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. S/V MITHRANDIR, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE VICINITY 10-00N 030-00W. VESSELS
   IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC DAKAR,
   PHONE: 2213 3826 5001, FAX: 2213 3826 5000.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2381/13.
